snippet: Councilman Eric Ulrich’s selection as Mitt Romney’s campaign chairman in the city seems intended to convince New Yorkers that not all the Republican presidential candidates are fringe-position lunatics.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column contends that the selection of Eric Ulrich as Mitt Romney's campaign chairman in New York City seems intended to convince New Yorkers that not all the Republican presidential candidates are extremists; Ulrich is youngest member of City Council and centrist Republican with working class roots.
lead_paragraph: Councilman Eric Ulrich’s selection as Mitt Romney’s campaign chairman in the city seems intended to convince New Yorkers that not all the Republican presidential candidates are fringe-position lunatics.

headline.seo: Eric Ulrich, Romney’s Young Republican in New York
headline.main: Mitt’s Young Republican, Up From the Streets
headline.print_headline: Mitt’s Young Republican, Up From the Streets
